Reviews.Title: Very Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Gene Polhamus
Reviews.Content: Received it for Christmas and was impressed with how light it is.  I have a Pentax ME with three lens and was hoping they would work on the new SLR.  They do.  Very thick manual but you don't need to read it all at once to use the camera.

Reviews.Title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
Reviews.Author: DBGoode
Reviews.Content: I have been researching and shopping for a DSLR camera for months. I had narrowed my choices down to Canon or Nikon, or so I thought. Then, I discovered PENTAX on a few blogs and found overwhelmingly positive customer reviews on different sites, which seems to be hard to come by when it comes to DSLRs. Most people seem to really love or really hate certain brands, leaving the ratings and reviews somewhat lopsided. When browsing Amazon recently, this lightening deal sealed the deal and I could not be more pleased. The price for the kit with a second lens was affordable considering the competition and I have to say that the picture quality is excellent! This camera has a lot of features, but you can get started quickly snapping shots using AUTO or SCAN. I have yet to take any video with it, but I will soon. I look forward to taking more pictures with this camera to fully explore everything it has to offer.

Reviews.Title: A diamond in the rough.  Pentax delivers yet again.
Reviews.Author: Wesley Williams
Reviews.Content: The Pentax K-500 is a great mid-level camera, particularly if you are invested in the Pentax universe.  I have multiple Pentax lenses from my conventional SLR that I've had for 10+ years.  I looked into purchasing a Pentax because I wanted to leverage my older Pentax lenses as I delved further into the digital SLR world.The 16MP sensor may not be as high as some of the other cameras on the market, but I've found that 16MP is more than enough for most photgraphers unless you plan on printing images above 22''.  Otherwise, you will be nmore than satisfied.The manual, automatic, and semi-automatic (Av-Priority, etc.) are highly responsive.  Changing the manual settings is seamless once you spend a few miniutes with the camera.  I was pleased with how responsive and accurate the sensor is.All in all, I think that this is a good buy for any mid-level photography who doesn't want to go the Nikon/Canon route for any number of reasons.  Admittedly, I have a somewhat irrational attachment to Pentax because it is the brand that I first learned how to shoot film on, but I objectively think that this is a great camera.  I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera in the mail a couple days ago and have already put it to the test in multiple ways—including low light situations, as I attended a wedding the day after receiving it!! It has done very well and was easy to use, since I just got it and didn't have time to play with it a lot yet—it is very user friendly!!I was a Canon user for many years and thought that I wanted another Canon, but I started doing some research and reading reviews before my next purchase, and I found that the Pentax line is very affordable—mainly because of its compatibility with older lenses—and that it delivers the high quality images that I would want for a very decent price.I would definitely recommend this camera!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, no charger
Reviews.Author: A. Ehrlich
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this camera. There was no charger included, although the description and manual suggest there should have been. Because of the bad reviews given for the manufacturer's charger and battery, I bought a different one and am happy with that. Overall I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants wonderful color rendering and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: great starter camera
Reviews.Author: lnam88
Reviews.Content: I was interested in taking pictures with a better camera other than a point and shoot, so I started doing some research. I decided to go with the pentax k500 camera and two lenses because of the price. It is very easy to start using even without reading the instruction manual. This camera takes good quality pictures with good color.It comes with the two lenses, battery and battery holder, usb cable, strap, and instruction manual. The items purchased were a camera bag and a 32gb sd card,If you are a beginner photographer this is the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: Better than I thought
Reviews.Author: Cheeriegirl
Reviews.Content: I’m a newbie to DSLR cameras and considered purchasing a Nikon D-3200 or 3300, but decided on this Pentax K500 once I saw the price – about $80+ cheaper at the time – almost a week ago. Unfortunately, I do not have another comparison, but for my needs (design portfolio), this camera rocks!! It shoots RAW (DNG) and high quality JPG photos and takes video. It shoots very well in low light, even without tinkering around with the settings.My camera came with four double A batteries, battery holder, neck strap and kit lens, but did not come with the AC power supply (not sure I’ll need this anyway). The lithium batteries (an optional purchase), are only sold to consumers in other parts of the world – there’s a notation in the product manual.The printed manual is very thick and provides functional step-by-step instructions. I did, however, have to view a YouTube video to figure out how to put the neck strap on! Oh, and make sure you put the lens on correctly, otherwise nothing will be visible in the viewfinder and the large screen will be quite dim – it will still take photos though!

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Francis J.
Reviews.Content: Since I purchased this camera, my interest in photography has been renewed. I have a digital point and shoot camera, but it can't compare with my new one!Great service and fantastic shipping time by the vendor!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: John A. Smoot
Reviews.Content: I am amazed at the clarity of the pictures. A 300 page instruction manual is intimidating but covers the functions well.

Reviews.Title: Always good
Reviews.Author: Randall Johnson
Reviews.Content: Pentax is the camera I started with in 1979 and have trusted their products since. With this camera I was able to use an older Macro very expensive macro lens. I have posted videos to youtube and everyone comments about how good the quality is.

Reviews.Title: Love the fact I can stick with Pentax
Reviews.Author: Jim Doyle
Reviews.Content: All my old SLR continue to work on a great camera.  I got my first  Asahi Pentax Spotmatic in Japan in 1967. I will be a loyal Pentax customer til I am pushing up daisys

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: R. Campbell
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! There are so many things that are nicer than canon's or nikon's at this price point (100% pentaprism, etc). Only thing that would have made it perfect is if the vf showed the focus points (K-50 does), but I can deal with that for how cheap this camera is.

Reviews.Title: Buy this camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Cole "tech junkie"
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera. Most bang for the buck. Have been greatly impressed with picture quality sand ease of use. Can't go wrong with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for me!!
Reviews.Author: trickedoutdavid
Reviews.Content: I'm not exactly a beginner. I am in a media major at school. I know what aperture is. I know what shutter speed is. I know what ISO is. But this is my first dslr. I looked through all the comparison sites and decided that I wanted a Pentax k-30. At this point you're thinking that I'm posting a review for the wrong item. No. I wanted a k-30. But after some research, I found that is has an older (uglier?) brother. The k-50. It was the perfect camera but I did some more research. By giving up an electronic level and the weather resistance, I can save about $100. And what else? I can also get double the lenses for the price. This is perfect. Lenses are working great thus far, though I can't wait to save enough for a 50mm prime. I've gotten a few filters, a rechargeable battery, and a camera bag with the money I saved. Can't wait to go pro :)

Reviews.Title: Great for stills......NOT a good choice for video!!!!!
Reviews.Author: A. Dutton "hh65flier"
Reviews.Content: I should have done my homework a bit more before buying this camera.  If your primary use is going to be for still shots, by all means....get this camera.But, if you are looking for a good budget DSLR camera for video, I don't think you will be too happy with the K500.  Images are are jittery, and suffer from excessive rolling shutter effects (straight lines become diagonal during camera movement).

Reviews.Title: Starting to get the hang of it.
Reviews.Author: Robert E
Reviews.Content: I uploaded some early pictures (and the camera settings for each) so you can judge for yourself. I was experimenting with various combinations of settings and features. I love the in-camera anti-shake feature because all my old Takumar and SMC Pentax K-mount lenses can use it. Even my really old screw mount lenses work with it. It really does allow hand held slow shutter speeds! Sharp at 1/15 sec. Super high ISO speeds are grainy as expected but I am able to take pleasing pictures that are impossible with cameras limited 3200 ISO. The two kit lenses are not "prime" but they are very very good and sharp. The camera can automatically correct for distortion and chromatic aberration, two common attributes of most non-prime lenses. So why pay the prime price?  Viewfinder prism is top notch. Flash has good range.  Auto-focus is fast and accurate.All in all, it feels well made, solid, and durable. I've had it for only a month.  I will post again if it fails for any reason.  But for now, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Michael Carmichael
Reviews.Content: It is what the reviews said it was.  Operating manual a little hard to read.  After shooting for a while it becomes easier.

Reviews.Title: like this camera
Reviews.Author: joe - joe
Reviews.Content: just started to use camera . and like the way it works. fine it easy to use. Camera came on time. it had a rebate in which I sent in and received. white the rebate make it a great buy

16 MP APS-C CMOS Sensor. A high performance 16 megapixel APS-C CMOS image sensor strikes the perfect balance between resolution and image quality. DA-L18-55mm lens included
ISO Speeds up to 51200. High sensitivity shooting up to 51200 ISO range improves noise performance throughout, even in low lighting.
Eye-Fi Card Compatibility with Eye-Fi wireless SD cards, the user can send images to a smartphone. Users can enable automatic transmission of images to a smartphone for sharing. Users can even select favorite images and resize before transmission.
Innovative In-body Shake Reduction (SR) Mechanism. The PENTAX in-body, sensor-shift Shake and Dust Reduction technology ensures sharp, image stabilized, auto-leveled, and dust-free imaging with any mounted lens.
Full 1080p h.264 HD video recording. Full 1080p HD video capture at 30 frames per second (60 FPS for 720p) features efficient h.264 compression, flexible exposure control, and HDR finishing options for stunning video quality.
